content.question: A group of students performs an experiment to determine the thermal conductivity <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of a material. They have several cylindrical rods made of the material, and the rods have different cross-sectional areas <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and lengths <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> . They place one end of each rod in an ice bath and the other end in a hot bath and measure the rate <math alttext="the fraction Q over delta lowercase t " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> of heat transfer. They plot their data with <math alttext="the fraction Q over delta lowercase t " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> on the vertical axis. Which of the following quantities, when plotted on the horizontal axis, will yield a linear best-fit line from which the thermal conductivity of the material could be determined?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction delta uppercase T over L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>Δ</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction A over delta lowercase t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction k delta uppercase T over L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><mi>Δ</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="the fraction A over L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction A over L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
